nila sancharayak sandaha japanaye swadesha katayuthu ha sanniwedana katayuthu amathi yoshitake sindo mahatha shri lankawata pamineyi.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha me wasare marthu masayedi japanaye kala sancharaye prathipalayak washayen eeye (28) shri lankawata pamini ee mahatha shri lankawa saha japanaya athara pawathina dingukalina sabandatha thawaduratath wardhanaya kara ganima aramuna bawa shri lankawe japana thanapathi karyalaya pawasayi.welenda, aayojana, aarathika, samajayiya, sanskruthika athuluwa sama kshethrayak sambandhayenma derata athara pawathina sabandatha kerehi mehidi awadhanaya yomu karana bawada shri lankawata pamini japana swadesha katayuthu ha sanniwedana katayuthu amathiwaraya janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha hamuwi dwiparshawika sakachcha pawathwimata niyamitha bawada ema thanapathi karyalaya kiyayi.eeta amatharawa ee mahatha shri lankawe radi sitina kalaya thula aarthika sanwardhana amathi basil rajapaksha saha janamadhya ha prawruththi amathi keheliya rambaukwalla mahathwarun samangada sakachcha kirimata niyamitha athara ehidi adala anshayanhi derata athara sahayogithawa wardhanaya kara ganimata apekasha karayi.
